original_text: But the Lord was gracious to them and had compassion and showed concern for them because of his covenant with Abraham, Isaac and Jacob. To this day he has been unwilling to destroy them or banish them from his presence.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱과 더불어 세우신 언약 때문에 이스라엘에게 은혜를 베풀며 그들을 불쌍히 여기시며 돌보사 멸하기를 즐겨하지 아니하시고 이 때까지 자기 앞에서 쫓아내지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord was gracious to them
because of his covenant with Abraham, Isaac and Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱과 맺으신 언약 때문이었더라

sentences.original_text: To this day he has been unwilling to destroy them
or banish them from his presence
